text:
This is due to the fact that there is no contact actually present within the design manager context. You could set some default values for the variables, for example
```{% set Surface_Name = contact.surface_name|default('Surface Name') %}```

Thank you <@U9KA594Q3>. The error has gone. But I have one more doubt that what if I don't want to set default value for  given variable?
```{% set Combination = contact.comabination_val  %}  ```
Any suggestions?

:upvote:  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-custom-fonts-in-drag-amp-drop-email-builder/idi-p/746480#M133555|Allow custom fonts in drag & drop email builder>
         _upvote this idea if you feel so inclined, thanks_
